scripts.init-types: rm -rf mavryk/types && dipdup -c dipdup.types.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.local.yml init
scripts.start: DEBUG_MODE=True LIQUIDITY_BAKING_ENABLE_INDEXER=False dipdup -c dipdup.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.local.yml run
scripts.wipe: DEBUG_MODE=True LIQUIDITY_BAKING_ENABLE_INDEXER=False dipdup -c dipdup.yml -c dipdup.contract.yml -c dipdup.local.yml schema wipe --force
